title: Update Media Buy Async Response - Failed
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for update_media_buy when status is 'failed'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that the update operation failed and no changes were applied.

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy that failed to update. Required for identifying which update operation failed.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining why the update failed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

errors.message: Cannot change product_id for existing package
errors.suggestion: Create a new package with the desired product instead

errors.message: Package with buyer_ref 'invalid_package_ref' not found in this media buy
